reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The room is clean and well-equipped if you wished to make your own meals throughout your stay. We stayed for 3 nights in a room with two single beds, no complaints.
reviews.title: Clean & Modern

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Parking:
reviews.title: Nice People

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Street parking is available along the Quai Eugene Meslin. Free on Sundays and before 0930 and after 1900(?) on weekdays. The area is well-lit and seems safe, so we didn't feel the need to utilize the pay-parking at the hotel, but it is available.
reviews.title: Solid Performer

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Internet:
reviews.title: Nice place, everything you need, but no charm

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Free wired internet in the hotel rooms, and free wireless internet in the lobby. There is also a computer in the lobby for guests to use.
reviews.title: Ideal location- excellent facilities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: This is a great location, about 10 minutes walk from the station, right next to the river and within range of many restaurants. I had a first floor corner room so was worried about the noise but the glazing is excellent. I did not make use of the kitchenette but this could have been a good alternative to the rather depressing breakfast buffet. Another minor quibble is that the shower door seal was ineffective, making for a large puddle that remained throughout the stay. On the plus side, the car-park is handy and the fitness room was useful (one bike, one treadmill and one rowing machine).
reviews.title: Nice room, shame about the breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: For me coming from a very modest home, this hotel was luxurious.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel worth staying in while in Caen

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: As I entered the room I couldn't help but notice the size of the space, and the amount of 'tools' left at my disposal. You are literally able to live here inside the hotel.
reviews.title: Pleasant Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The kitchenette, comes stocked with everything you could possibly need to make a decent meal. It comes with all of the basic cooking utensils like: a pot, some pans, and some knives. Additionally, they've also left you with dinner ware including glasses; mugs; and wine glasses. The kitchenette has an electric flat top with two burners, but no oven (unfortunately). There is a microwave though (not sure if it doubles as an oven), and as an added bonus, if you aren't feeling in the mood to do your dishes, the unit is equipped with a dishwasher. Lastly the kitchen comes with a tiny fridge and freezer, which allows you to purchase some groceries and save on some meals.
reviews.title: Great for a few days

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: At Adagio Centre, it is also made apparent that they do care about the impact on the environment by providing you with a garbage can for recycling, and one for all other trash (there was no composter).
reviews.title: Nice Hotel, Good Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Recent stay in May at this property for 2 nights, Centrally located in Caen with secure pariking
reviews.title: Contemporary Hotel no frills

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: if you need it , Front desk staff were nice and helpful. We were a family of 4 , 2 teens.. Apartment was spacious but bedding not really suitable for 4 adults. Had some issues with the room,
reviews.title: A great Place to Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: 2 lights did not work (including bathroom), asked for it to be replaced day 1 and they forgot.
reviews.title: Very well located and 2-room apartment is comfortable for a family of 4

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Reason was that water was leaking from light fixture hall. Ground floor apartment had sugar ants in closet and bedroom area..I am not sure how this was rated so high but certainly was at the bottom of our list after 2 weeks in Europe. Room furnishings were very cheap and ikea like.
reviews.title: Great Value, Convient & Pleasent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did not have breakfast here but upon inspection was continental and nothing to get excited about. Considering our experience my rating was a gift. Staff was trying to help. Also if doing Normandy beaches it is a little bit of a drive.
reviews.title: Roomy, clean and super breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Very well located close to the river. Excellent infrastructure! The hotel is all new and the furniture and decoration leaves you very comfortable. But staff could be more helpful. Nevertheless if you want to eat out in the city, you must leave the hotel as early as possible and preferably with a booking in advance.
reviews.title: Perfect location at quay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Booked based on the reviews and as a family, we like having the room that an apartment provides.
reviews.title: Overnight Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were really impressed by this property, booked a 1 bed apartment, appears to be very new, the equipment in the kitchen looked barely used. As we arrived on a Saturday night we were able to park directly outside, although parking could be arranged in advance.
reviews.title: Very modern hotel - very nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Although quite a busy area, I think the central part of Caen could be reached on foot, it would be nice to go back as it seemed quite a nice city.
reviews.title: A Canadian in Caen

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There was a sofa bed in the 'lounge' area and we had a problem getting it set up, we noticed the area behind the sofa had not been cleaned properly. This was the only downside and would not hesitate to stay again.
reviews.title: Comfortable apartment
